de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.utilities.datastructures.heap

Class AbstractHeap

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.utilities.datastructures.heap.AbstractHeap
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DoubleHeap, IntegerHeap, ObjectHeap

    public class AbstractHeap
extends Object
    Abstract base class for heaps.
